titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory in Super Bowl LIV in the successful 100th season of the National Football League.
A resolution congratulating the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory in Super Bowl LIV.
A resolution congratulating the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory in Super Bowl LIV in the successful 100th season of the National Football League.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amendment to the Title and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Kansas City Chiefs and their staff, Kansas City Mayor Quinton Lucas, Missouri Governor Mike Parson, and Chiefs fans for their victory in Super Bowl LIV.
